source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_00<tab>Myste has been waiting for you for a long time.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_00<tab>Мист ждёт вас уже давно.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_01<tab>Although Sidurgu has yet to recover from his injuries, Myste will wait no longer. He wants to resume his search for souls in need of succor, and he is willing to forgo their assistance, if you are. Anything to hasten the conclusion of this mad crusade. Castrum Oriens, the site of Ilberd's grand slaughter, may offer what you seek.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_01<tab>Сидургу ещё только предстоит оправиться от ран, но Мист не может больше ждать. Мальчик желает продолжить свой поиск нуждающихся в помощи и готов это сделать без содействия рыцаря — если на то <var 08 E905 ((согласна)) ((согласен)) /var> ты. Что угодно, лишь бы этот безумный поход завершился... Возможно, искомое найдётся у форта Ориенс, где прошла грандиозная бойня Илберда.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_02<tab>Myste grows weary at the sight of so many men and women willing to give their lives in service to a greater cause. A sight that is all too familiar, perhaps. Elsewhere shall we look for listless spirits.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_02<tab>Миста удручает вид стольких людей, готовых отдать свои жизни во имя высшего блага. Возможно, это зрелище слишком ему знакомо. Поищем бессильных где-нибудь ещё.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_03<tab>In the depths of a cave by a flickering fire, a man sits alone, waiting to die. Gallien, an Ala Mhigan refugee for whom you once made medicine long, long ago, reveals that he shared it with another refugee, ensuring that the man lived...and that he would not. His friend Houdart went on to fight for the Griffin and even served as his body double, but ultimately died at Baelsar's Wall with his mad master and so many others. They made their choices, and such are the consequences, but Myste cannot help but meddle. He conjures a simulacrum of Houdart to comfort the dying man, who bids his dead friend to go to Rhalgr's Reach and pray for their fallen brothers.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_03<tab>В глубинах пещеры у мерцающего костра сидит человек, в одиночестве ожидающий смерти. Это Галлиен, беженец из Ала Миго, для которого когда-то очень давно ты <var 08 E905 ((сделала)) ((сделал)) /var> лекарство и который, как оказалось, поделился им с другим беженцем. Тот, другой, оправился... а Галлиен нет. Его друг Худерт отправился потом сражаться за Грифона и даже служим ему двойником, но в конце концов пал у Стены Бельсара вместе со своим обезумевшим лидером и многими другими. Таков был их выбор, и за него пришлось платить. Но Мист не может не встрять в чужое дело. Парень создаёт симулякр Худерта, чтобы он утешил умирающего, но тот просит друга отправиться в Хватку Ралгра и помолиться там за всех их падших товарищей.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_04<tab>The shade born of Gallien's memories tells you of how he always wanted to meet you, a larger-than-life hero...unaware that he eventually did at Little Ala Mhigo. He laments his fate, wishing he could go back and convince his former self not to place his trust in the Griffin...but if such things were possible, you wouldn't have a broken shield, now would you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_04<tab>Призрак, рождённый из воспоминаний Галлиена, рассказывает, как он всегда надеялся встретить столь потрясающего героя... не зная, что, на самом деле, уже тебя встречал у Малого Ала Миго. Он оплакивает свою судьбу и жалеет, что не может отправиться в прошлое и убедить самого себя не доверять Грифону... Но будь подобное возможным, ты бы не <var 08 E905 ((была владелицей)) ((был владельцем)) /var> пробитого щита. Не так ли?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_05<tab>You rescue Houdart and Myste from wild beasts, but though they are unharmed, the shade abruptly stumbles and grips his head. Dizziness, he claims, and nothing more, before imploring you to hurry. He is as poor a liar as the boy.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_05<tab>Худерт и Мист спасены от диких зверей, но призрак вдруг спотыкается и хватается за голову, хотя хищники не успели никому навредить. «Просто голова закружилась», — утверждает он и торопится в дорогу. Лжец из него скверный, совсем как из мальца.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_06<tab>Again Houdart falters, suddenly weak and in pain. A man's memories cannot outlive him, he says, and Gallien is running out of time. He will try his best to carry on, but in the end, it is not up to him...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_06<tab>Худерт снова спотыкается. Он слаб и мучается болью. «Воспоминаниям не пережить своего владельца», — говорит он. А времени у Галлиена немного. Худерт постарается двигаться дальше, но как ни крути, это зависит не от него...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_07<tab>Look how he burns with fervor, with desperation, with faith. How he sings of his homeland and wills himself to stand. How he marshals his strength to put one foot in front of the other. In that moment he lives again.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_07<tab>Посмотри, как в нём горит страсть, вера и отчаяние. Как он поёт о своей родной земле, как заставляет себя подняться на ноги. Как собирается с силами, лишь бы сделать ещё один шаг вперёд. В эти мгновения он живёт вновь.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_08<tab>The spell is broken. Houdart is no more, which can only mean one thing: we are one step closer to ending this charade.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_08<tab>Заклятие развеялось. Худерта больше нет, а это значит лишь одно — мы на шаг ближе к концу этой шарады.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_09<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> is not the first, nor will <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be the last to betray you. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will implore you to see reason, to seek solace in the fiction. And when you refuse, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> will have no recourse but one. As I did not. Be ready.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_09<tab><var 08 E905 ((Она не первая и не последняя)) ((Он не первый и не последний)) /var>, кто тебя предаст. <var 08 E905 ((Она)) ((Он)) /var> будет просить тебя образумиться, искать утешения во лжи. А когда ты откажешься, у <var 08 E905 ((неё)) ((него)) /var> останется лишь один выход. Как был и у меня. Будь наготове.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_10<tab>The dead are forever beyond our reach, and we have no choice but to accept the inevitability that everyone we know and love will join them in time...or do we? Distraught by his failure to see Gallien's final wish fulfilled before his passing, Myste muses on the possibility of a world where time and death hold no power of us. A world you could share. You need only ask. But we know better.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_10<tab>Мёртвые навеки вне нашей досягаемости, и у нас нет иного выбора, кроме как это принять — принять неоспоримый факт того, что все наши близкие и любимые канут в забвение... или выбор всё-таки есть? Мист убит горем из-за того, что не смог исполнить последнее желание Галлиена, и помышляет о мире, где время и смерть не имеют над нами власти. О мире, который <var 08 E905 ((могла)) ((мог)) /var> бы разделить и ты. Только скажи. Но мы знаем, что это не выход.

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_11<tab>Sidurgu is concerned that Myste's failure will spur him to deeper depths of depression. Even more concerning is the fact that the boy has yet to return to Ishgard, though you believed he would. Why, I do not know. The aether wanes, and he has but one chance left. Be ready, damn you. Be ready.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_11<tab>Сидургу беспокоится, что неудачи повергнут Миста глубже в пучину депрессии. К тому же — и это куда тревожнее — мальчик всё ещё не возвратился в Ишгард, хотя тебе казалось, что должен был. С чего бы это? А почем мне знать. Эфир рассеивается, и у него остался лишь один шанс. Будь наготове, чёрт тебя возьми. Будь наготове.

※Следующее задание тёмного рыцаря будет доступно у Сидургу по достижении 70-го уровня.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Myste at Castrum Oriens.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_00<tab>Встретьтесь с Мистом в форте Ориенс.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_01<tab>Search the Fringes for people in distress.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_01<tab>Поищите бедствующих людей в Клиньях.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_02<tab>Поговорите с Худертом.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_03<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_03<tab>Следуйте за Худертом.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_04<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_04<tab>Следуйте за Худертом.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_05<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_05<tab>Следуйте за Худертом.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Myste.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_06<tab>Поговорите с Мистом.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_07<tab>Use Souleater to consume the swirling abyss.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_07<tab>Используйте способность «Пожиратель душ» и поглотите клубящуюся бездну.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_08<tab>Pay /respect to the fallen at Bloodstorm.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_08<tab>Выкажите павшим почтение (/respect) у Кровавого шторма.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_09<tab>Speak with Sidurgu in Ishgard.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_09<tab>Поговорите с Сидургу в Ишгарде.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>I wasn't joking, by the way. About the moogle punching.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>Я, вообще-то, не шучу. Насчёт того, чтобы ты <var 08 E905 ((врезала)) ((врезал)) /var> какому-нибудь муглу.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_005<tab>He'll heal, but I'm afraid it's going to take a while. The moogles can probably help, though Sid would have to let them─and good luck convincing him.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_005<tab>Он оправится, но, боюсь, на это уйдёт время. Муглы, наверное, нам помогут, но только если Сид их к себе подпустит. Теперь бы ещё убедить его поддаться.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_010<tab>As you can see, Sid has yet to fully recover from his bout with Ser Ompagne, and there is no telling how much more time he will require.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_010<tab>Как видите, Сид ещё не полностью оправился после схватки с сэром Омпанем, и неизвестно, сколько ещё времени на это уйдёт.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_011<tab>But my quest will brook no delay. If we must seek out another soul in need of succor without their assistance, then so be it. Do you agree?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_011<tab>Но моё призвание не может более ждать. Если нам придётся разыскивать нуждающихся без его помощи, то так тому и быть. Вы согласны?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_012<tab>Then we are of one mind. Now then, where shall we begin our search...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_012<tab>Мы мыслим одинаково. Итак, где же нам начать поиски...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_013<tab>War is perhaps the greatest source of man's misery. So much death and destruction... A battlefield, perhaps...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_013<tab>Величайший, должно быть, источник горя для людей — это война. Столько смертей и разрушений... Быть может, поле боя...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_014<tab>Yes, yes... This slaughter you bore witness to at Castrum Oriens is precisely that of which I speak. A tragedy which tore apart the lives of every man and woman it touched...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_014<tab>Да-да... Резня, которую вы видели в форте Ориенс — я имею в виду именно что-то подобное. Трагедию, что разодрала на части жизни всех, кого коснулась...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_015<tab>My mind is made up. That is where we must go.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_015<tab>Я принял решение. Туда мы и пойдём.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_016<tab><sigh> If I had it my way, I'd not let you out of my sight...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_016<tab><вздох> Будь моя воля, я бы глаз с него не спустил...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_100_016<tab>But, again, it's your soul crystal at stake. I'm only here to help you reclaim your aether. If you think you can look after him by yourself, then by all means.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_100_016<tab>Но опять же, на кону твой кристалл, не мой. Я лишь стараюсь помочь тебе возвратить эфир. Если считаешь, что сможешь приглядеть за ним <var 08 E905 ((сама)) ((сам)) /var>, я мешать не стану.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_017<tab>As for me...I think I've finally regained enough strength to make the journey back to Ishgard. When you've finished in Gyr Abania, come and find us at the Forgotten Knight.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_017<tab>Ну а что до меня... Думаю, я уже достаточно силён, чтобы проделать путь обратно в Ишгард. Когда закончите свои дела в Гир Абании, приходите и отыщите нас в «Забытом Рыцаре».

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_020<tab>Don't get cocky. The little bastard's a handful and a half.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_020<tab>Смотри не зазнавайся. За мальцом глаз да глаз нужен.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_025<tab>Myste cares for us all, in his own way, but you most of all, I think...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_025<tab>Мист по-своему заботится о нас всех. Но о тебе, кажется, больше всего...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_030<tab>Castrum Oriens... How it buzzes with life. So many brave soldiers, resolved to do their duty no matter the cost...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_030<tab>Форт Ориенс... Он так полон жизни. Сколько же здесь отважных солдат, полных решимости исполнить свой долг какой угодно ценой...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_031<tab>But have no doubt there will be a cost, and it will be most high, for no man is beyond the reach of fate. Death will not be denied...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_031<tab>А цену с них спросят — в этом нет сомнений. И она будет высока, ведь никто не в силах ускользнуть от хватки судьбы. Смерть неотвратима...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_032<tab>This place...this place...it weighs on me... Anywhere but here I would search...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_032<tab>Это... это место... оно давит на меня... Я готов искать где угодно, но только не здесь...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_040<tab>Come...come to share the fire? I would stand to greet you, stranger, but my legs...my eyes...the whole of me is not what it once was...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_040<tab><var 08 E905 ((Пришла... пришла)) ((Пришёл... пришёл)) /var> посидеть у костра? Я бы встал и поприветствовал тебя, <var 08 E905 ((странница)) ((странник)) /var>, но мои ноги... мои глаза... я уже не так силён, как был когда-то...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...I know that name, and that voice! By Rhalgr, you're still alive! Praise Him, praise Him...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Я знаю это имя и этот голос тоже! Ралгр всемогущий, ты ещё <var 08 E905 ((жива)) ((жив)) /var>! Слава ему, слава...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_042<tab>Who is this man on the verge of death? Is he your friend?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_042<tab>Что это за человек? Он почти что мёртв. Это ваш друг?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_043<tab>Nay, nay, though I am flattered that you would think so...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_043<tab>Нет-нет. Хотя мне и лестно, что ты так думаешь...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_044<tab>This <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> made medicine for me long, long ago, at the behest of Captain Meffrid...when we were still in Quarrymill.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_044<tab>Когда-то давным-давно <var 08 E905 ((эта женщина сделала)) ((этот мужчина сделал)) /var> для меня лекарство. По просьбе капитана Меффрида... когда мы ещё были в Каменоломне.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_045<tab>If I'd kept it all for myself, I'd've made a full recovery...but I couldn't. I had a dear friend, you see, and so I made a choice. He got better. I didn't.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_045<tab>Прими я его целиком, излечился бы совершенно... но я не мог. У меня был близкий друг, понимаете. И я сделал свой выбор. Ему стало лучше. Мне — нет.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_046<tab>Ended up working for the Griffin, he did. As a right-hand man, even. But like all the rest who went to the Wall, he never came back.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_046<tab>Потом он отправился служить Грифону. Даже был его правой рукой. Но назад он не вернулся, как и все те, кто пошли брать Стену.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_047<tab>The irony of it, that I'd be the one to outlive them all, if only for a little while.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_048<tab>And so I sit here and await the reckoning, as I rot from the inside out. The husk of the freedom fighter I aspired to be.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_049<tab>No, no! This is not the ending you deserve! I will not allow it!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_050<tab>The man he spoke of, the one whose life he chose to save at the cost of his own. That man is proof of his nobility! If he were here...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_051<tab>Do you wish to see him again? Your dear friend?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_052<tab>Houdart? Aye, more than anything. But there's no point in praying for the impossible. He died with the rest. I'm sure of it.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_053<tab>He was the Griffin's double, and one of his top commanders besides...

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_054<tab>You're a kind boy, you are, and I'm grateful for the company in these twilight hours. But there's no need to trouble yourself further. My time is nearly spent.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_055<tab>Then spend the remainder thinking of better days, Gallien, and not dwelling on the deaths of me and mine.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_056<tab>Gods strike me down... Houdart? No, no, it can't be... This is naught more than a trick, an illusion... A lie...

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_057<tab>But...even if it is a lie...
Hear me, Houdart. I've a favor to ask of you. One final favor for a dying fool...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_058<tab>Return to the Reach. To Bloodstorm. Offer a prayer to our brothers there.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_059<tab>I will, Gallien. You have my word.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_060<tab>We should talk. Outside.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_070<tab>I have to believe...I have to believe...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_075<tab>Will you go with Houdart? He has to make it. I've naught left but this...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_080<tab>To Meffrid and Gallien, you were larger than life. I always wanted to meet you...and here we are. Though I reckon this doesn't really count, does it?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_081<tab>If only I could go back and tell myself what a blind, bloody fool I was to place my trust in the Griffin. Maybe then Gallien wouldn't be dying alone.

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_082<tab>Listen, he hasn't got much time. I'll lead the way. The wilds between here and the Reach aren't too dangerous, but as you can see, I'm unarmed, so I'll not be any good to you in a fight.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_083<tab>Nor will I, I fear. We will have to rely solely on you for protection...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_084<tab>Heh, I've no doubt you can keep us safe. You're the bleedin' Warrior of Light, after all! Let us be off!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_100<tab>Strong as ever, eh? Stronger even than you were that day, I reckon...

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_101<tab>They say that when the Griffin's men realized you were coming to stop them, they grew panicked and unsure. How could they take up arms against a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> hailed as the hero of Eorzea? A hero who had personally intervened in their lives for the better?

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_102<tab>Some stood their ground and died then and there for it, I imagine, while others looked the other way and tried to find some more imperials to kill. I pray I wasn't foolish enough to try and fight you. I owed you better...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_103<tab>Houdart? Houdart! Speak to me!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_104<tab>I'm fine... Just got dizzy all of a sudden. We have to hurry, do you hear me? We have to make it to the Reach!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_110<tab>Houdart has to stay strong! He has to remember what's at stake!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_120<tab>I made a promise...to Gallien... I will not fail you, brother...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_121<tab>It cannot be the distance. We haven't traveled far enough yet...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_122<tab>A man's memories...cannot outlive him...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_123<tab>I told you, he hasn't...hasn't got much time. And neither do I...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_124<tab>I'll hold on as long as I can, but...in the end...it's not up to me...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_130<tab>No! I will not allow it! He will endure! We will fulfill Gallien's wish!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_140<tab>So...so close...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_141<tab>Houdart! You must go on! You must make Gallien whole! Remember, Houdart!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_142<tab>Don't you think I know that!? He...he saved my life! And I...we all went and died for naught! For naught! All we ever wanted was to go home...

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_143<tab>O come ye wayward brothers,♪
Bereft of hearth and home,♪
Beneath yon burning star there lies♪
A haven for the bold...♪

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_144<tab>Raise up your hands and voices!♪
Let fill your hearts with pride!♪
Above the churning waters we♪
Stand strong and unified!♪
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_145<tab>...We can...we can still go home.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_146<tab>Even now, after everything we have done, we can still go home...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>In the depths of the abyss, a flame lingers...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_160<tab>He fell and would not rise. He began to shake and...and...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_161<tab>He was so close! He could have made it─he should have made it! How cruel the gods to tempt us with this promise of redemption!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_162<tab>We...we did not fail. They failed us...they failed us!
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_163<tab>They...we...I...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_164<tab>Forgive me...forgive me... My failure is my own. I had my chance, and I squandered it. Reclaim that which was yours.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_170<tab>It was not mine to take, but I took it. For that is who I am at heart.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_180<tab>As the aether flows into your soul crystal once more, from the depths of the fading abyss, you hear a whisper...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_181<tab>...It is not finished. Not yet. You will come and pray with me.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_190<tab>Here is where we are to pay <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>respect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to the dead.

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_191<tab>A storm of blood approaches fast,
Hells open, Heavens weep.
For no one soul doth lie beyond
The measure of His Reach.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_200<tab>...What good are prayers to the dead. They have not ears to listen.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_201<tab>Nor eyes to see or hearts to console. Naught remains of them save fleeting recollections soon lost to time and to the abyss...

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_202<tab>We are left only with pain.
A lingering sadness for names and faces consigned to oblivion.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_203<tab>How are we to withstand this relentless onslaught which threatens to consume us? Is there no truth but this, that all men must die?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_204<tab>Is this our world to suffer, or to shape?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_Q1_000_205<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_206<tab>The world is what we make of it. I by my sword. That is my truth.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_207<tab>Such is the gods' design.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_208<tab>...Indeed. We are only bound by the gods' law by choice.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_209<tab>...But it need not be ours, do you see?

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_210<tab>We cannot save everyone, can we.
Sometimes, it is all we can do to save ourselves.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_100_210<tab>Does any of it matter? What, if aught, have we wrought by our own hands?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_211<tab>One last time. I gave you my word, and I mean to keep it.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_212<tab>But know this. Every intervention has come at cost. A sacrifice. When I have finished, naught will remain of me.

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_213<tab>But...it does not have to be. For all our faults, for all our failures, we have made a difference. All the lives we have shattered, we can make them come together again.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_214<tab>Time and death, our true enemies, need hold no power over us. I can make a place for you in my world. You need only ask.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_215<tab>We should go back to Ishgard. You must miss Sid and Rielle...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_220<tab>Is everything all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_230<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I pray your trip to Gyr Abania was productive.

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_231<tab>...I'm sorry to hear that. I mean, I am glad you reclaimed more of your aether. I but wish the circumstances hadn't been so...depressing. For Myste's sake. We shall have to see how he is feeling when he returns.
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_232<tab>Hm? No, as far as I am aware, he has yet to return to Ishgard. He certainly isn't here, as you can see.

TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_233<tab>...Oh, godsdammit. Don't tell me he decided to run away! And just when I was beginning to trust the little bastard... <sigh> No, no, I could still be wrong. He's earned a little trust. A few days' worth, no more...
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_090<tab>
